title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 485.5 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 485.5 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

The division shall accept requests for records and produce
records during regular business hours, which are 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., except on

Saturdays, Sundays and holidays. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
485.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
